title: Fundraising Campaign Analytics
description: End-to-end data analytics project for a fundraising platform analyzing campaign performance, donor behavior, and transaction patterns. Features SQL data extraction, data cleaning pipelines, interactive visualizations, and a Streamlit dashboard for actionable insights.
shortDescription: Analytics platform for campaign performance and donor insights
highlights: Built interactive Streamlit dashboard with real-time metric calculations
Implemented complex SQL queries with joins, aggregations, and window functions
Analyzed campaign success rates, donor retention, and conversion funnels
Created comprehensive data cleaning and preprocessing pipelines

metrics.notes: End-to-end analytics workflow from SQL extraction to interactive dashboard

title: Movie Recommendation System
description: Full-stack data engineering project building a movie recommendation system using Snowflake data warehouse, Airflow for ETL orchestration, DBT for data transformation, and Preset for BI visualization. Enriches movie data using TMDB API and provides similarity-based recommendations.
shortDescription: Data pipeline and recommendation engine with ETL workflows
highlights: Designed and implemented complete ETL pipeline with Airflow DAGs
Built data warehouse models using DBT with testing and documentation
Created interactive Preset dashboard with KPI cards and visualizations
Integrated TMDB API for movie data enrichment

metrics.notes: Production-ready data pipeline with orchestration and BI visualization

title: University Management System
description: Comprehensive university management system for handling student, faculty, and administrative operations. Demonstrates full-stack development skills with database design, API development, and user interface implementation.
shortDescription: Full-stack management system for university operations
highlights: Designed relational database schema for university entities
Implemented CRUD operations for students, faculty, and courses
Built user-friendly interface for administrative tasks

metrics.notes: Full-stack application demonstrating software engineering principles

title: Data Warehouse Lab 1
description: Data warehouse implementation project focusing on dimensional modeling, ETL processes, and data architecture design. Covers star schema design, fact and dimension tables, and data integration techniques.
shortDescription: Data warehouse design and dimensional modeling
highlights: Designed star schema with fact and dimension tables
Implemented ETL processes for data integration

metrics.notes: Foundation project for data warehouse concepts

title: Data Warehouse Lab 2
description: Advanced data warehouse project building upon Lab 1 concepts. Focuses on advanced ETL transformations, incremental loads, data quality checks, and warehouse optimization techniques.
shortDescription: Advanced data warehouse with ETL and optimization
highlights: Implemented advanced ETL transformations and incremental loading
Added data quality validation and error handling
Optimized warehouse performance and query efficiency

metrics.notes: Advanced techniques in data warehousing and ETL
